channel.title: Gdpr on Adventures in Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in Gdpr on Adventures in Hugo

item.title: I've Complied, I think.
item.description: Like Sam and Simon over at definit.co.uk I’ve done a quick GDPR-related overhaul of the site. Like the two English scholars and gentlemen, I’ve created the required Privacy Policy page. I’ve also deleted all existing comments on the site, and disabled comments sitewide — hopefully that’s enough. Oh, joy.
